briefdescription.para: Compute mean squared error between two float arrays.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the first float array.
Pointer to the second float array.
Number of elements in both arrays.

simplesect.para: The mean squared error as a float.

briefdescription.para: Check that all elements of an INT8 array lie within [-127, 127].
Smoke test for per-tensor scale, quantize and dequantize.

detaileddescription.para: Generates a simple ramp, quantizes with per-tensor scaling and checks basic properties (range, small MSE, non-zero scale).

briefdescription.para: Test per-row scaling on a matrix with different row magnitudes.

detaileddescription.para: Builds two rows with different dynamic range to ensure independent scales.

briefdescription.para: Validate symmetric clamping at the INT8 limits.

detaileddescription.para: Builds values above/below the representable range and checks that quantization clamps to [-127, +127].

briefdescription.para: Program entry: runs all PTQ unit tests.

simplesect.para: EXIT_SUCCESS if all pass; EXIT_FAILURE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: C unit tests for INT8 PTQ min-max scaling and (de)quantization.

detaileddescription.para:
These tests validate:
Per-tensor and per-row scale computation
Quantize -> Dequantize round-trip numerical behavior
Symmetric clamp behavior in [-127, +127]
